channel.title: Drawing - View Position and Boundary on The CAD Coder

item.title: Solidworks VBA Macro - Get View Position
item.description:
Objective

In this article, we understand “how to” Get View Position in Drawing document from VBA macro.

This is most updated method of Get View Position in an drawing document.

item.title: Solidworks VBA Macro - Get View Outer Boundary
item.description:
Objective

In this article, we understand “how to” Get View Outer Boundary in Drawing document from VBA macro.

This is most updated method of Get View Outer Boundary in an drawing document.
